llm_res.rule: Transfers of 0 values must be treated as normal transfers and fire the `Transfer` event.
llm_res.function: function transferFrom(address sender, address recipient, uint256 amount) public virtual override returns (bool)

llm_res.rule: Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
MUST trigger on any successful call to approve(address _spender, uint256 _value).
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
The `transfer` function should return `true` if the operation is successful.
llm_res.function: function transfer(address recipient, uint256 amount) public virtual override returns (bool)
